name: Endless Tower - 0.3.2
description:
Endless Tower is an RPG Dungeon crawler. You have to scale up the tower as far as you can go and try to survive. Level up, and find random loot to make your character stronger.  There is a chance to enter special floors, Treasure rooms, Boss rooms, and Trap rooms.

This game is very early stages. If there are any bugs, glitches, or even have suggestions please post a comment and I will get back to it as soon as possible.

---Update 0.3.2---

-Added Bosses.
-Added more Areas.
-Enemies now have a chance of sleeping.
-Lowered chance of Traps spawning from 50% to 30%.
-Shields now have Block Chance in it.
-Items now have a chance to give Block Chance.
-Removed Potion Items and Key items. They no longer go to Inventory.
-There is now a potion button, restores 30%. Can be increased with passives, and equipment. 
-Gold, potions and keys is now displayed in Inventory.
-Changed font size to a smaller size.
-Added Shop (Buy, Sell, Gamble) every 5th Floor.
-Added Sell All button.
-Can only buy Potions, and Keys at the moment.
-Added Hardcore Mode
-Added Boss Rush Mode
-Added Difficulties (Easy, Normal, Hard, Nightmare, Hell) 
-Added Baby Slimes
-Fixed Critical Damage not showing
-Fixed Magic Damage HUD
-Added "HP and MP per level" when choosing a race.
-Changed some equipment mods
-Added Magic Defence
-Revamped Item Data base.
-Changed Races, and Classes stats.

---Controls---

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys to move. If you have touch screen controls, you can turn the touch controls in the options menu.

Q is HP Potions

E is MP Potions

To attack an enemy, just move into them. The inventory is best used with a mouse.
